mapper.insert: insert into shares (id, gpdate, gpdm, name, spj, zgj, zdj, kpj, qspj, pjj, zde, zdf) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gpdate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{gpdm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{spj,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{zgj,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{zdj,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{kpj,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{qspj,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{pjj,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{zde,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{zdf,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update shares set gpdate = #{gpdate,jdbcType=DATE}, gpdm = #{gpdm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, spj = #{spj,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, zgj = #{zgj,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, zdj = #{zdj,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, kpj = #{kpj,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, qspj = #{qspj,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, pjj = #{pjj,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, zde = #{zde,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, zdf = #{zdf,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select id, gpdate, gpdm, name, spj, zgj, zdj, kpj, qspj, pjj, zde, zdf from shares
select id, gpdate, gpdm, name, spj, zgj, zdj, kpj, qspj, pjj, zde, zdf from shares
